response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,200. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a product that is worth significantly more than what you are paying. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow you to enjoy the full value of the product. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.
